## Overview

Build development environment

## Tasks

- [ ] ⚙️ Setup `.gitignore`
- [ ] ⚙️ Setup `.vscode/settings.json`
- [ ] ⚙️ Setup `package.json` as stub
- [ ] ⚙️ Setup `.npmrc`
- [ ] ✅ Setup `ESLint`
- [ ] ⚙️ Setup `jsconfig.json` for type check in VSCode
- [ ] ✅ Setup `Jest`
- [ ] ⚙️ Setup GitHub Workflows
